column3:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard If you select multiple rows and then this checkbox, the Update Existing checkbox will be selected for all selected companies which are also included in the copy process.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard By selecting multiple rows and then this checkbox, all selected companies will be included in the copy process.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard Select this checkbox if the company should be included in the copy process.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard The name or description of the company.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard Select any of the following options for updating existing fields when using Basic Data Synchronization:\par
\par
\pard{\pntext\f0\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf2\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-96\li96\b No Update:\b0  If records already exist in the target company, no updates should be done from the source company\par
\b{\pntext\f0\'B7\tab}Modification Only:\b0  If records already exist in the target company, only modified fields from the source company should be updated\par
\b{\pntext\f0\'B7\tab}Update All:\b0  If records already exist in the target company, all fields should be updated from the source company\f0\par
\pard\par
\b\f0 Note:\b0  The option \b Modification Only\b0  can only be choosen when Basic Data Synchronization is set up for this window.\f0\par
}
